original_solution_mapping.L1: There were 36-16=<<36-16=20>>20 without pre-printed name badges.
original_solution_mapping.L3: There were 20-10=<<20-10=10>>10 with no name badge.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1791.
    Returns: the number of delegates not wearing name badges.
    """
    # L1
    total_delegates = 36 # 16 of 36 delegates
    pre_printed_badges = 16 # 16 of 36 delegates arrived with pre-printed name badges
    delegates_without_pre_printed = total_delegates - pre_printed_badges

    # L2
    half_divisor = 2 # Half of the remaining delegates
    hand_written_badges = delegates_without_pre_printed / half_divisor

    # L3
    no_name_badge = delegates_without_pre_printed - hand_written_badges

    # FA
    answer = no_name_badge
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: There were {total_delegates}-{pre_printed_badges}=<<{total_delegates}-{pre_printed_badges}={delegates_without_pre_printed}>>{delegates_without_pre_printed} without pre-printed name badges.
There were {delegates_without_pre_printed}-{hand_written_badges}=<<{delegates_without_pre_printed}-{hand_written_badges}={no_name_badge}>>{no_name_badge} with no name badge.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: There were 36-16=<<36-16=20>>20 without pre-printed name badges.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: There were 16-10=<<16-10=6>>6 with no name badge.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'pre_printed_badges' (value: 16) was used instead of 'delegates_without_pre_printed' (value: 20).
